column5: Hit up the St Marys River rapids this afternoon. I was on a solo mission looking for some steelie action. I caught all but one fish bouncing spawn or pinkies today. One small rainbow came on a cleo as you will see. I gave flies and white twisters an honest go today but couldnt get a hit on them.  ice on the ponds....    The river.....could definilty smell the salmon today....      The fish...            Underwater videos  Release small bow  Bigger bow release  another small one  The rapids at the end of the day    Can't complain about the afternoon, it was nice and relaxing.....but I hope the size of the fish improve next time!  TDunn
What camera were you using? I've always wanted to do underwater filming.
nice little chromers bud.  i bet she was a little chilly down there this morning.
I was using my cousins Olympus Stylus...waterproof, shockproof, freeze proof...Great cam  TDunn
It was a crisp -1 when I went out the door around 10:30-11...   TDunn
Cool vids for sure. Nice of that one to stick around for you eh. Thats some clear water.  Keep em coming
Nice fish and cool vids....thanks!
Love the videos. Thanks for the report!
Cool underwater footage TDunn Congrats on them beauties Thanks for sharing Leechman
nice!! the rainbow cleo is money!! thats always the first lure i toss out for salmon and steelies in the river! good work!
The videos make me feel like im in the water.. nice shootin'.
Too cool man, wow this inspires me to buy a wp camera instead of more fishing gear. Might fall for Dave's Fuji camera he always talks about.  Thanks for the report sir, MTBF
Yep, those under water clips are cool.
nice looking fish like you said nothing huge but definatley plenty of them cool shots, those cameras are awsum too a buddy of mine has one
You have inspired me. I gotta head down there saturday morning.  Any tips, or would you like to join me in a boat at the yankee power plant
Still getting Cohos in there? Or is that a picture from before?  Nice fish nonetheless!
Dara  I will be out there tomorrow afternoon in a boat. Green Lund and i will more than likely be at the american powerhouse also...   TDunn
Eazy, Ya still gettin them but it was the only one that day....there also is a few white tails swimming around too!   TDunn
Friggin' Zombies stinkin up the whole damn island.
Is it a better bet than the rapids?
Dara,  PM sent
i'll tell you guys somethin..... i'll be goin for whitefish at the locks tomorrow ..... my buddies grandfather went there on wednesday and caught 3 but lost 2. so i think the odds are promissing.
